title: deki001
author: deki001
content: I can provide Dextools Trending at cheap rates.Also, NO UPFRONT PAYMENT IS NEEDED, and I accept hourly payment(So if it gets out of trending sometimes, you will not be damaged, since you will be paying only for the hours it stays there!)For example, the Price for 3 hours trending is $900After it starts trending you will pay 300$, after 60 minutes, you pay 300$ more.. etc After 3 hours your payment is300*3=900$The price for 24 hours is $4.5k It is totally risk-free for you!My trending bot, your connections and sales,What do you think?You can contact me on Telegram to discuss further:https://t.me/dekidevhttps://t.me/dekidev

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: OP, please do not spam this forum. This are already six identical topics, which is not allowed. One topic for the same service is ok, you can bump every 24 hours. You need to delete all others.I have to ask you though. If your service is so good and you think it's worth 4,5k for 24 hours, I guess your clients can easily return that money. However, it is not clear to me why you sell such knowledge, why you don't work for yourself and earn even more. Why all this waste of time?

comments.author: deki001
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on September 06, 2023, 08:53:16 AMOP, please do not spam this forum. This are already six identical topics, which is not allowed. One topic for the same service is ok, you can bump every 24 hours. You need to delete all others.I have to ask you though. If your service is so good and you think it's worth 4,5k for 24 hours, I guess your clients can easily return that money. However, it is not clear to me why you sell such knowledge, why you don't work for yourself and earn even more. Why all this waste of time?Markets choose the price, not me  The average sales price for Dextools trending is 5-6k right now. There are even people who payclose to $10k when there are many middlemen (re-sellers) in a deal.I don't sell the knowledge though, just a service.The client will be trending on Dextools for 24 hours and that's it, he won't know how I did it.If he wants to do it again, he will need to pay once more.If your question is why don't I make a token, and use it on my token to make money, the answer would be clear:Making a successful token is much more than just trending on Dextools. A lot of other things should collide too.Not to mention that requirements for trending are there as well. I can not make every token trend, only those with $150k + liqI got many re-sellers from these posts, who bring me daily leads  So I don't think it was a waste of time at all!Thanks for your comment though My contact:https://t.me/dekidev
